about_the_game:
100 Kills Challenge is a fast-paced first person shooter, combining the bloody reality of modern combat with a return to basics: Kill one hundred enemies before anyone else. How you do it is up to you: Be brutal, be clever, fight on your own or as part of a team, just be the first to reach one hundred kills.

Remember the rules: There are none. All that matters is reaching one hundred kills: Fighting as a lone wolf in 12 player deathmatch, as part of Blue or Red teams in team deathmatch, or facing a computer-controlled onslaught in our brutal PVE modes. And remember: The amount of ways to kill will increase, as the game is being constantly expanded and developed!

About 100 KILLS CHALLENGE ORIGINS: Only the death match mode and 2 maps are open, with a total of 19 weapons to choose from. The official version will have a team death match mode, 12 maps, and more than 40 weapons.

About the Game

100 Kills Challenge is a fast-paced first person shooter, combining the bloody reality of modern combat with a return to basics: Kill one hundred enemies before anyone else. How you do it is up to you: Be brutal, be clever, fight on your own or as part of a team, just be the first to reach one hundred kills.

Remember the rules: There are none. All that matters is reaching one hundred kills: Fighting as a lone wolf in 12 player deathmatch, as part of Blue or Red teams in team deathmatch, or facing a computer-controlled onslaught in our brutal PVE modes. And remember: The amount of ways to kill will increase, as the game is being constantly expanded and developed!

About 100 KILLS CHALLENGE ORIGINS: Only the death match mode and 2 maps are open, with a total of 19 weapons to choose from. The official version will have a team death match mode, 12 maps, and more than 40 weapons.
name: 100 KILLS CHALLENGE: ORIGINS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980/AMD Radeon R9 390X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: Enter the fray in an intense, fast paced first person shooter experience. Kill using firearms, explosives, drones, and air support. Dominate maps in deathmatch, team, and PVE. Win with tactics - or sheer brutality. Remember: Hundred kills. One arena. Zero rules. May the best player win!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
